source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_00<tab>Adalberta is gravely concerned for the fate of an old friend.
target: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_00<tab>採掘師ギルドのアダルベルタは何やら慌てているようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_01<tab>The flustered Adalberta reveals to you that Wide Gulley has reported his father's abuse of power to the Concern's upper management. The guildmaster bids you speak with Wide Gulley and learn all you can of the situation, that she might help her old friend and mentor.
target: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_01<tab>アダルベルタから依頼を受けた。ウルダハの採掘師ギルドにいる「ワイド・ガリー」と話をしよう。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_02<tab>Wide Gulley admits that he has filed an official complaint to the Concern, so ashamed he was of his father's actions. He suggests you speak with the accused in order to hear his side of the story.
target: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_02<tab>ワイド・ガリーと話した。ウルダハの採掘師ギルドにいる「ディープ・キャニオン」と話をしよう。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_03<tab>Deep Canyon reveals that his actions were fueled by the long-standing desire to bring down Adalberta for her betrayal years ago. Deliver this shocking revelation to your guildmaster.
target: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_03<tab>ディープ・キャニオンと話した。ウルダハの採掘師ギルドにいる「アダルベルタ」と話をしよう。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_04<tab>According to Adalberta, Deep Canyon's belief that she betrayed him is nothing but a misunderstanding. Loath to see him destroy his career due to this perceived slight, she bids you speak with Wide Gulley, and with him find a way to save his father.
target: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_04<tab>アダルベルタと話した。ウルダハの採掘師ギルドにいる「ワイド・ガリー」と話をしよう。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_05<tab>In order to prove that he is fit to remain vice foreman, Deep Canyon must demonstrate to the Concern that he still has the confidence of guild members. To this end, you must procure three chunks of darksteel ore, an extremely rare metal found only from unspoiled mineral deposits in Coerthas. You are warned that these deposits only appear during certain times of day. Use the technique Truth of Mountains to locate darksteel ore that appears in the Coerthas central highlands at 1:00 a.m. (Eorzea time), mine the required quantity, and return it to Adalberta as quickly as you are able.
target: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_05<tab>ワイド・ガリーと話した。ウルダハの採掘師ギルドにいる「アダルベルタ」に「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」を3個納品しよう。「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」は、クルザス中央高地の「ドラゴンヘッド」に出没する、「未知の採掘場」から採掘できるようだ。対象の「未知の採掘場」は、エオルゼア時間1:00頃から一定時間出没し、スキル「トゥルー・オブ・ミネラル」使用時にナビマップに表示される。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_06<tab>Owing to your intervention, Deep Canyon has been given a chance to redeem himself. With the matter now laid to rest, speak once more with the relieved Adalberta, who awaits you in the Miners' Guild.
target: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_06<tab>アダルベルタに<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>を納品した。ウルダハの採掘師ギルドにいる「アダルベルタ」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_07<tab>Adalberta thanks you for the part you played in sparing Deep Canyon a fate of ignominy, and lavishes you with praise for your growth as a miner. She bids you go forth and practice your craft for the benefit of all. May your toils never go unrewarded!

※The next miner quest will be available from Adalberta once you have completed the main scenario quest “Before the Dawn.”
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SEQ_07<tab>アダルベルタに報告した。彼女はディープ・キャニオンのために、困難な採掘をしてくれた冒険者に感謝し、冒険者の成長をたたえた。アダルベルタは、採掘師としての冒険者の名が、エオルゼアにとどろく日を楽しみにしているようだ。一日でも早くその日を迎えるために、採掘師として仕事に励もう。

※以下の条件を満たすと、採掘師ギルドのアダルベルタから、新たなクラスクエストを受注することができます。
1.「メインクエスト：第七星暦ストーリー」の、
　「希望の灯火」を完了する。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, thank the gods you're here! It's Wide Gulley... He's gone and filed a complaint against his father to the Concern, citing an abuse of power!
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_000<tab>大変よ、ワイド・ガリーが
父親ディープ・キャニオンの不正を告発したの！
ディープ・キャニオンは苦しい立場に追いこまれた……。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_001<tab>It has forced Deep Canyon into a difficult position, to say the least. And though the two of us haven't exactly seen eye to eye of late, I still owe the man a great debt. I would go to him and offer what aid I could, but he's like to spurn even the attempt.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_001<tab>……ねえ、あたしの頼みを聞いてくれない？
ディープ・キャニオンが、あたしを恨んでるのは知ってる。
でも……あの人は、あたしにとって大切な先輩なの！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_002<tab>I know full well how much I've already asked of you, but I would be <var 1A 02 /var>eternally<var 1A 01 /var> grateful if you'd lend Deep Canyon aid in my stead. To get started, it might be best to see what possessed his son to inform on his own flesh and blood.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_002<tab>あたしを恨んで道を踏みはずしたなら、彼を助けたい。
……だから、ワイド・ガリーから話を聞いてきて。
実の父を告発した理由を。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_010<tab>Here at the guildmaster's biddin' again? Well, I see no reason not to tell you about the situation. You know most everythin', anyroad.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_010<tab>ギルドマスターに頼まれて、事情聴取か？
そういうことなら、お前にだけは話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_011<tab>My old man was foistin' dangerous jobs on the guild, forcin' its members to risk life and limb fer his own agenda. If that ain't the very definition of abuse, I don't know what is. You yourself were on the receivin' end o' this, I'm sure you'll recall.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_011<tab>親父は、危険な依頼を
採掘師ギルドに押し付け、嫌がらせしてきた。
事情があるにせよ、もはや、俺も見過ごせない。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_012<tab>Kin or no, I couldn't stand by an' watch my guildmates bein' used like pawns in his game. So I went to the Concern's upper management an' filed a complaint.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_012<tab>迷惑をかけた、多くの人に申し訳なくてな……。
落とし前をつけねば、と思った。
だから俺は、告発するしかなかったのだ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_013<tab>He hasn't said a word to me since, but I'd have a guess that he might be willin' to speak with <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>. You've certainly done your fair share fer the guild. He's out by the entrance right now, 'case you want to hear his side of the story.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_013<tab>……親父にも、親父なりの言い分はあるはず。
親父なら採掘師ギルドの入口にいるだろう。
本人から、直接、話を聞くがいい。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_020<tab>It's been some time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You're doubtless here as regards my son's accusations. Well, it's just as he claims.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_020<tab>君か……久しぶりだな、こうして話をするのは。
だが、申し開きをすることなど何もない。
全ては事実、息子の告発どおりだ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_021<tab>Now, this ain't gonna spare me what's comin', but I had a reason for my actions: vengeance. <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> was supposed to become master of the Miners' Guild. Everyone knew I had the best claim. But Adalberta robbed me of the honor─<var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>, the man who taught her nigh everythin' she knows about her trade!
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_021<tab>だが、私はそれが間違っていたとは思わない。
……私には、確固たる目的があったからな。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_022<tab>She went behind my back and conspired with her predecessor! An' then <var 1A 02 /var>fancy<var 1A 01 /var> who ended up bein' chosen to lead... By way of payback, ever since I became vice foreman, I've striven to make Adalberta's life harder than tryin' to mine with a dull pickaxe.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_022<tab>かつて、あの女は先代のギルドマスターと共謀して、
この私を追い落とした……その復讐こそが目的！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_023<tab>All those outrageous demands? To make her look incompetent. At the same time, I went about ensurin' my son was well placed to take over as guildmaster. An' my plan was about to bear fruit, too...till <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> came along and ruined it all by bein' my son's better.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_023<tab>私からギルドマスターの座を盗んだアダルベルタに
復讐する、それだけを考えて生きてきた……！
そのために、息子をギルドへ送り込んだ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_024<tab>Heh... By your expression, I take it you're doubtful of the tale. Well, you need only ask your dear guildmaster. She can vouch for everythin' I've said.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_024<tab>しかし、君がギルドに現れたせいで、計画は崩れた。
息子では君に勝てない……だから、私は焦ったのだ。
私の話が嘘だと思うなら、「アダルベルタ」に確認するがいい。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_025<tab>If you're wonderin' where my father vanished to, he's been summoned to an inquest. The chairman of the Concern himself, Master Fyrgeiss, will be in attendance. An' that's just the beginnin'.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_025<tab>査問会で、親父は激しく糾弾されるだろう。
砂蠍衆のひとりで、アマジナ鉱山協会の総裁である
フィルガイスが姿を現すからな。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_026<tab>The chief foreman's sons will be present as well─the twins Popokkuli and Seserukka. It'll be a sight to behold, all the guild's top players in one spot. An' it won't go easy for him, you can be sure of that.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_026<tab>加えて、鉱山社社長の名代として、
社長の息子ポポックリとセセルッカも出席するらしい。
そうそうたる顔ぶれが、そろうというわけだ……。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_030<tab>What!? Deep Canyon believes <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> cheated him out of becoming guildmaster!? That's not it at all! I <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> aspired to this position...
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_030<tab>あたしが、ギルドマスターの座を盗んだですって！？
そんな誤解で、彼は人生を棒にふろうとしているの！？

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_031<tab>Gods, I was only an Ala Mhigan refugee, working as hard as I could to get by... I never even <var 1A 02 /var>dreamed<var 1A 01 /var> that I could rise as I did. And I suspected even less that it was that selfsame dedication to my work that would lead to me being chosen.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_031<tab>あたしは、アラミゴ出身の日陰者だから
ギルドマスターを継がないと言ったんだけど
先代はアラミゴ人だからこそ、継がせたいと言ってきたの。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_032<tab>If I had known that accepting the mantle would tear us apart... <sigh> Lamenting the past won't avail us. I only know that I wouldn't be where I am without the man. I <var 1A 02 /var>can't<var 1A 01 /var> allow this misunderstanding to cost Deep Canyon everything.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_032<tab>それを、あたしが策略でギルドマスターの座を
奪い取ったのだと誤解して、
あたしに対して怒っていたのね。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_033<tab>I simply couldn't bear it. I'm not sure there's aught we can still do for him at this point, but we must try.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_033<tab>……お願い、キミの力を貸して。
彼の査問会が迫っているわ。
彼が誤解で破滅する前に、真実を知らせなきゃ！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_034<tab>Listen. Wide Gulley is the one who filed the complaint. If you were to throw your own weight behind some of my concerns, then maybe...maybe he could yet do something. Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It would mean so much.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_034<tab>もう一度「ワイド・ガリー」に、詳しい話を聞いて。
息子の彼なら、査問会の切り抜け方を
知っているかもしれないから。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_040<tab>Adalberta wants to help my old man? <sigh> Truth be told, it ain't my wish to see his career destroyed neither. I only wanted to teach him a lesson─make him know that he can't just use people for his own ends.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_040<tab>父を助けたいと……アダルベルタは言ってくれたのか。
俺だって、実の父の破滅は望まない！
だが、どうすれば親父を助けられるんだ……？

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_042<tab>But now that the Concern knows, it's been taken out o' my hands. In their eyes, my father's actions've jeopardized relations with the Miners' Guild, an' nothin' could be worse.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_042<tab>……結局、アマジナ鉱山社にとっての親父の罪とは、
鉱山社とギルドとの信頼関係を破壊したこと。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_043<tab>So, they've given him a test. If he's to remain vice foreman, he must prove at the inquest that he still has the confidence of the guild.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_043<tab>ゆえに親父は査問会から、試練を出された。
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」と呼ばれる珍しい鉱物を、
ギルドに命じて、掘らせることができるかってな。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_044<tab>An' they ain't interested in no words─they want hard evidence. That is to say, they're demandin' that someone from the guild show him loyalty by goin' an' diggin' up three of the toughest damn chunks of ore there is to find: darksteel.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_044<tab>味方がいない親父は、手ぶらで査問会に出る羽目に……
だが、査問会で「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」を突きつけられれば、
親父の立場は逆転できるかもしれん！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_045<tab>Problem is, he's got no allies in the guild, on account of his own behavior. I certainly don't qualify for the task, bein' his son. An' Adalberta can't do it neither, 'cause she's the bleedin' guildmaster─that's just how it works.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_045<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」が3個でもあれば……っ！
だが、採掘場はクルザス全域に及び、採掘は極めて難しい。
俺の腕では無理だ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_046<tab>This leaves you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We don't have much time before the inquest begins, so you'll have to hurry. An' I wasn't exaggeratin' afore─darksteel's elusive as all hells, located in the snowy reaches o' Coerthas an' nowhere else.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_046<tab>クルザスにあるという、「未知の採掘場」で
その「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」を採掘するためには、
日没から日の出まで待ち続けるほどの忍耐が必要だと聞く。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_047<tab>To actually find the stuff, you'll first need to use your Truth of Mountains technique to locate unspoiled mineral deposits. Then─an' gods know why─you'll have to survive a night in the cold for the deposits to reveal 'emselves. Finally, you dig...an' you pray.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_047<tab>その苦難に耐えきれる者が、採掘師のスキル
「トゥルー・オブ・ミネラル」を使うことで、
初めて見つけられるのだそうだ……。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_048<tab>When you have enough chunks of darksteel ore, take 'em to Adalberta. I'll make sure she knows what's goin' on.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_048<tab>これは、お前ほどの腕がないとできない。
「アダルベルタ」には、俺から話をつけておくから
お前は「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」を集めたら、彼女に届けるんだ！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SYSTEM_000_049<tab>Use the technique Truth of Mountains to locate darksteel ore that appears in the Coerthas central highlands at 1:00 a.m. (Eorzea time), mine the required quantity, and return it to Adalberta as quickly as you are able.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SYSTEM_000_049<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」は、「未知の採掘場」から採掘できます。
未知の採掘場は、エオルゼア時間1:00頃から、しばらくの間、
クルザス中央高地の「ドラゴンヘッド」に出没します。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_050<tab>Wide Gulley's told me all about the situation. Be sure you bring in the darksteel ore as soon as you've got it.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_050<tab>話は聞いたわ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」を3個でしょう、急いで！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_051<tab>Now, I feel this bears mentioning, but regarding how to go about obtaining the ore... It may sound ridiculous, but it's exactly as Wide Gulley says.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_051<tab>いい、ワイド・ガリーの言葉を思い出して！
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」は「未知の採掘場」から採掘できる！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_052<tab>You'll need the endurance to survive a night in Coerthas, and the technique Truth of Mountains to locate unspoiled mineral deposits. Twelve speed your way!
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_052<tab>入手するには日没から日の出まで待つ忍耐と……
スキル「トゥルー・オブ・ミネラル」が必要よ！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_053<tab>Incredible, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Your talents are truly boundless. Hopefully, these will suffice to spare Deep Canyon. But let's make haste to the inquest. Wide Gulley is already on his way.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_053<tab>なんとか間に合ったわ！
ワイド・ガリーは、すでに査問会へ向かってる。
あたしたちも、急いで後を追いましょう！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_POPOKKULI_000_60<tab>Well, did you get a guild member to bring you darksteel ore? 'Cause make no mistake, Deep Canyon, if you came to this inquest empty-handed, we will <var 1A 02 /var>end<var 1A 01 /var> you. Your time with the Concern will be just a memory.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_POPOKKULI_000_60<tab>ギルドに「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」を掘らせることは、できたか？
あんたの私怨が、ギルドとの関係を崩したんだ。
それを修復できなきゃ、あんたは終わりだぜ？

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_61<tab>Ungh, I... Well...
target: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_61<tab>そ、それは……。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_62<tab>We have the ore right here, procured by <var 29 EB02 /var> of the Miners' Guild!
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_62<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」ならあります！
ギルドの<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が掘ったものです！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SESERUKKA_000_63<tab>Twelve be good, she isn't lying! This is darksteel, and some of the finest I've ever seen.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SESERUKKA_000_63<tab>こっ、この吸い込まれるような闇色は……
本物の「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」だよ、兄さん！
「ヴォイドの魔鉄」とも呼ばれる正真正銘の本物だ！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_POPOKKULI_000_64<tab>Hmph. It's no ordinary miner who can find darksteel, let alone stuff that looks this good. Seems your reputation is well earned.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_POPOKKULI_000_64<tab>ああ……実に見事な「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」だ。
さすがは噂の<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>だな。
若手随一の採掘師って言われるだけはある。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_POPOKKULI_000_65<tab>That said, we're hardly here to question your ability. Though I find myself wondering as to your motives. Why did you bring the ore?
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_POPOKKULI_000_65<tab>だけど解せないな。
どうして、この場に「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」を持ってきたんだ？

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SESERUKKA_000_66<tab>Aye, I'd know the same. Why stick your neck out for <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var>? He's given you nothing but trouble!
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SESERUKKA_000_66<tab>そうだよ、なんでギルドマスターが助けるんだ！？
あんたは恨まれてるんだろ、この男に！？

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_67<tab>What in the seven hells're you tryin' to pull, Adalberta!? I don't need anyone's pity, yours least of all!
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_67<tab>……何のつもりだ、アダルベルタッ！？
私に情けをかけているとでも言うのかッ！？

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_68<tab>I'm not here to give you my pity, but to clear up the misunderstanding between us!
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_68<tab>情けじゃない！
あなたの誤解を……解きたかったのよ！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_69<tab>Misunderstandin'...?
target: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_69<tab>誤解……だと？

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_70<tab>Listen to me, Deep Canyon. I never wanted to become guildmaster! The responsibility was thrust upon me, and there was naught to be done for it.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_70<tab>……あたしは本来、あなたとの勝負から……
ギルドマスターの継承争いから降りるつもりだった！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_71<tab>Gods, when my name was being bandied about for the position, my first instinct was to take myself out of consideration. Aye, I spoke to the guildmaster in private, as you say. But it wasn't to connive against you─it was to give up my claim!
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_71<tab>あの日……あたしは辞退することを告げに、
先代ギルドマスターの元を訪れたのよ。
あなたは、それを目撃したの！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_72<tab>Y-You expect me to believe that!?
target: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_72<tab>な……そんな話、信じられるか！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_73<tab>If I had truly betrayed you back then, would I have bothered to come here?
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_73<tab>本当にあなたを裏切っていたのなら、
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」を<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>に
掘らせたりしない！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_74<tab>B-But...if that's true, then everythin' I've done... By the Twelve, to have taken this so far...
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_74<tab>だが……だが……！
本当だとしたら、今さらそれはないじゃないか！
私は一体、何のために……！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_75<tab>You didn't want to admit defeat, Father. Adalberta beat you out on her own merits. You knew this in your heart, but you refused to accept it.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_75<tab>あんたは結局……自分の負けを認められなかったんだ。
だから、「ギルドマスターを見かけた」ことを
不正に結びつけ、敗北の理由として決め付けた。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_76<tab>In your pride, you convinced yourself that she betrayed you. But by doin' so, you only validated why you were passed over for guildmaster in the first place.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_76<tab>親父、あんたがギルドマスターに勝てなかったのは……
敗北を素直に認められない、器量の狭さが理由だ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_77<tab>Please, Father, let go of the past. Accept that you were beaten, as I have with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and let's start over.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_WIDEGULLEY_000_77<tab>認めよう、親父……あんたの敗北を。
そしてもう一回、今日からやり直そう、全部を。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_78<tab>You have it in you to do so, Deep Canyon─to begin anew. I know of your love for mining more than anyone.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_78<tab>やれるはずだよ、ディープ・キャニオンなら。
あなたの才覚は、このあたしが一番よく知っている。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_79<tab>If you would be willing to try again, I promise you the guild's full cooperation.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_79<tab>そして、あなたがやり直したいのなら……
採掘師ギルドを代表して、今後の全面協力を約束するわ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SESERUKKA_000_80<tab>Full cooperation? Are you <var 1A 02 /var>sure<var 1A 01 /var> about this?
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SESERUKKA_000_80<tab>……全面協力だって？
それでいいのかよ、アダルベルタ？

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_81<tab>Aye, I would leave the past where it belongs─in the past. The guild wants only to look forward, and to continue working with the Concern.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_81<tab>これ以上、遺恨は残さない。
採掘師ギルドは今後も変わりなく、
アマジナ鉱山社と付き合っていくつもりよ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_82<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> was the biggest victim in this whole affair, yet <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is willing to give Deep Canyon another chance. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> wouldn't have brought the darksteel ore otherwise.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_82<tab>なにせ最大の被害者である<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>が、
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」を採掘するために働いてくれたんだもの。
あたしや他の連中が蒸し返す権利なんてない。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_POPOKKULI_000_83<tab>That's well and good, but what about <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>? Can you really forget everything he's done?
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_POPOKKULI_000_83<tab>なるほど、じゃああんた個人はどうだ？
あんたらの因縁、水に流せるのか？

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_84<tab>...I can. Above all else, I miss my old friend and mentor. To get him back, I would forgive much and more.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_84<tab>できるわよ。
元より、あたしはこだわってはいないわ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_85<tab>A-Adalberta...
target: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_DEEPCANYON_000_85<tab>アダルベルタ、お前……！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_POPOKKULI_000_86<tab>Well, I'm inclined to lay this matter to rest. Any objections, Sese?
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_POPOKKULI_000_86<tab>わかった、あんたがそこまで言うなら、
今回だけは、全てをなかったことにする。
それでいいか、セセルッカ？

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SESERUKKA_000_87<tab>If you're satisfied, Brother, then so am I.
target: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SESERUKKA_000_87<tab>……兄さんの決定なら、異論はないよ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_FYRGEISS_000_88<tab>Then it is settled! Vice Foreman Deep Canyon, by request of the Miners' Guild, you shall retain your present office at Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern. Through hard work, I trust that you will make amends for past transgressions.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_FYRGEISS_000_88<tab>決まりだな、ではディープ・キャニオン……
罪は、今後も職務に励むことで償うこと！
これにて査問会を閉会だ！

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_89<tab><sigh> I'm full glad that it's over... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I would have a word with you in private. Would you mind returning to the guild with me?
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_89<tab>終わったわね……ご苦労さま、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
今回の一件について少し話すことがあるから、
ここを出たらギルドまで来てくれるかしら？

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_090<tab>I asked you here so that I might thank you properly.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_090<tab>……あらためて言うわね。
ありがとう、キミのおかげで万事上手くいったわ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_091<tab>Had you not been on hand to help, Deep Canyon's career would have ended prematurely, and in disgrace.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_091<tab>彼には貸しを作った格好だけど、
正直言って、返してもらえなくてもいいのよ。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_092<tab>Worse, I might have lost my dear friend forever. I owe you a debt that I'll likely never be able to repay.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_092<tab>ただ……もう一度くらい、彼を「先輩」と呼びたくてね。
その願いは叶いそう……本当に、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_093<tab>Ah, but look at you. In no time at all, you've grown into a miner who can make the earth yield up even darksteel ore, the rarest of metals. There's nothing left for me to teach you.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_093<tab>それにしても……あの「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5121)) 01 /var>」すら採掘するなんてね。
もう、あたしがキミに教えることは、何もないみたい。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_094<tab>As an adventurer, you're like to find yourself in all corners of the realm. But wherever your road takes you, I want you to practice our craft for the good of all.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_094<tab>これからは、冒険者として世界を旅するその先で、
学び覚えた採掘師の知識と技を使ってみせてほしい。
採掘師という仕事を、世界に見せつけてほしい。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_095<tab>Go well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and may your toils never go unrewarded!
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_ADALBERTA_000_095<tab>楽しみね……。
世界の人々が採掘師ギルドを訪れるたびに、
キミの名前を褒め称える、その日が来ることが。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>This concludes the miner quests for FINAL FANTASY XIV: A Realm Reborn. In order to undertake the next series of quests, you must first meet the following requirements:
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>「採掘師」の物語が、ひとつの区切りを迎えました！
次の「採掘師」のクラスクエストを開始するためには、
以下の条件を満たす必要があります。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “Before the Dawn.”
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>1.「メインクエスト：第七星暦ストーリー」の、
　「希望の灯火」を完了する。

source: TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SYSTEM_000_502<tab>Once you have done so, the next miner quest will be available from Adalberta.
target:
TEXT_CLSMIN500_00646_SYSTEM_000_502<tab>条件を満たし、採掘師ギルドの、
「アダルベルタ」に話しかけ、
新たなクラスクエストを開始しましょう！
